title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 125 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 125 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: They that trust in the LORD shall be as mount Zion, which cannot be removed, but abideth for ever.
lineList.cn: （上行之诗）倚靠耶和华的人，好像锡安山，永不动摇。

lineList.en: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the LORD is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
lineList.cn: 众山怎样围绕耶路撒冷，耶和华也照样围绕他的百姓，从今时直到永远。

lineList.en: For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.
lineList.cn: 恶人的杖不常落在义人的分上，免得义人伸手作恶。

lineList.en: Do good, O LORD, unto those that be good, and to them that are upright in their hearts.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你善待那些为善，和心里正直的人。

lineList.en: As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the LORD shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: but peace shall be upon Israel.
lineList.cn: 至于那偏行弯曲道路的人，耶和华必使他和作恶的人一同出去受刑。愿平安归于以色列。
